data.name: VILLAGE THE SIBERIA
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST - EBOLA 3

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1547860/EBOLA_3/
Money from the game VILLAGE THE SIBERIA will go towards localization and voice acting for EBOLA 3.


About the Game

You play the role of a boy in an ordinary family that lives in Siberia. In a series of mysterious events, something terrible happens, and a parasite appears that uses people as carriers. Your goal is to find out who you can trust in your family and which family members are not infected. If you stay in the house with one of them, something terrible could happen ... so think about who you can trust ... and which of them isn't acting weird ...


• Scary atmosphere.
• High-quality soundtrack.
• Mysterious plot.
• Modern graphics.
• Intrigue.
• Detective.
• You can interact with many objects.

data.short_description: Uncover the terrible secret of Siberia as a little boy in the first person.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CORE i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 820m
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit

content_descriptors.notes:
Attention! Viewer discretion is advised. The game
contains scenes of violence and blood.
